column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man suspected of being very drunk drove a car into a central divider causing damage
column4: but luckily not injure any people.------The incident happened at 12:10 AM on October 6
column5: 2020 along the Russian Federation Boulevard of the at the base of the 7 Makara Bridge in Sangkat Teuk Thla
column7: Phnom Penh.------According to sources at the scene
column9: a man was apparently very drunk and was driving a  Ford Ranger with license plate Phnom Penh 2BD-4589 at high speed before the crash. ------NKD
